transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji. Haan Himanshu ji Anurag baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se aapka account manager. phone nahi kiya tha wo apne phone se login kar raha tha bas.
Customer: Nahi nahi but haa unhone kiya hoga but unhone na call ke option pe click kiya ya to fir ho sakta hai ki galti se unhone search kiya hoga dashboard pe aata hai customer care ka us pe waha se unhone click kiya hoga to call gayi hogi. Kyunki mere paas ek second ka call show kar raha hai bas turant cut gaya tha.
Executive: Chaliye dekh lijiye aap, theek hai?
Customer: Haan to iske alawa to aur koi issue nahi hai na profile mein sir?
Executive: Nahi, koi issue nahi.
Customer: Achcha ek baat bataiye hamara last discussion hua tha catalog ko lekar ke to us pe bhi kab se kaam karenge sir? Kyunki bahut cheeze pending hai aur although score kafi low hai 56%.
Executive: Chaliye dekh lenge proper ji ho jayega dekh lenge theek hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha aur kuch kuch jo calls miss ho rahi hai wo kaun dekh rahe hain?
Executive: Calls miss ho rahi hai, theek hai.
Customer: Kya kar rahe hain?
Executive: Dusre phone hai?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan haan boliye ji sir. Ji.
Customer: Nahi hath to nahi mil payega sir. Nahi nahi hath to nahi mil payega sorry.
Customer: Gyan Mansarovar, Gyan Mansarovar milega hath nahi.
Customer: Gyan.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Haan ji bataye sir.
Customer: Haan main keh raha hu kuch kuch dekhiye improvement ke jo parameter hai wahi call mein discuss karunga aapse to thoda sa aap bhi note down kar lijiyega ek baar wapas se recall kar deta hu. Sabse pehla hamara jo CTQS hai sir matlab catalog ka jo quality score hota hai har product ka to wo humko maintain karna hota hai to abhi jo currently hai wo hai 56% to bahut low hai to hume sare products ki cheeze theek karni hogi bahut sare products mein name, price, photo aur specifications nahi hai jo humne last discussion kiya tha but abhi wo jyada improvement nahi hua hai. To sabse pehle to hume catalog quality score par kaam karna hai. Dusra jo hamari calls hoti hai calls ka response rate abhi aapke pure profile ka chal raha hai 70% jo abhi last ke seven days ka dikha raha hai 81% it means ki is mahine jitni calls aayi hai unme se kitni call chuti hai total bata deta hu aapko 65 call mein se kuch 12 calls miss ho gayi hai. Hai na? To ek baar isse bhi thoda sa correct kariyega last month chaliye 30 call miss hui thi abhi tak 12 hi hui hai to main nahi chah raha hu ye aur badhe. To thoda sa koshish kariye ki calls ka ratio na gire. Hai na? To ye do cheez dhyan rakhiyega. Teesra leads ka to consumption theek hai but thoda sa ise aur badhaiye. Abhi beech beech mein ruk sa raha hai pichle ek mahine mein 12-13 din ka dikha raha hai. Hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur ek hai aapka ratings ka part to ratings mein aapka four out of five aa raha hai. 303 users ne aapko ratings diya hai matlab connect kar rahe hain bahut sare buyers aapko last aapki rating 23 October ki dikha rahi hai. Hai na? To theek hai aur logo se ek baar connect kariye jinse bhi aapki deal hui hai jo bhi cheeze hui hai to aap unse aur ratings le sakte ho apne matlab ki score ko aur improve kar sakte ho ki four out of five aur badhega to aur achcha rahega profile ke liye. Hai na?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To ye cheeze ho gayi to catalog mein ye cheeze must hai. Inko karwaiye aur aap hi karenge ya sir jaise aapne bola ki bhai login kar rahe hain to wo bhi dekhte hain na?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: To wo nahi kar pa rahe hain kya ya fir mujhe guide karna padega unko bataiye.
Customer: Main bolta hu kar dega. Agar dekhiye kuch help chahiye to mera number aap unko de dijiye seedha seedha unke paas unka kaun sa number hai sir abhi jo profile mein unme se hai koi sa number ya alag se koi sa number hai?
Customer: Alag se dusra number hai.
Executive: Haan to aap mere ko na whatsapp mein bata share kar dijiye kyunki main jab bhi phone karta hu inhi dono number pe karta hu aur unke paas bhi mera number hona chahiye kal ko fir se customer care pe na call kare isliye aap unko mera number de dijiye aur mujhse ek baar baat karwa dijiyega to main unko samjha dunga yaha yaha pe kya hai aur aap bhi thoda sa dhyan dijiye sir kyunki ye chhut raha hai kafi mahino se wo profile pe hamper kar raha hai. Hai na Himanshu ji aapse mera September mein bhi discussion hua tha last mein to yahi cheeze hui thi October mein bhi ho rakha hai to do mahine se to hum discuss kar hi rahe hain in cheezon ke liye. Hai na?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To ye cheeze bahut jaruri inko sahi karwana hoga to bataiye kab se ho jayega ye kaam start to main usi hisab se fir guide karta rahunga.
Customer: Chaliye ho jayega.
Executive: Haan iske last end tak kara denge karenge wise last end tak kyunki kehna bhi jaise ticket hai to uske regarding fir details bhi mangenge na hamari respected team ki kya kaam kar rahe hain kya nahi to isliye main keh raha hu thoda sa jaldi se jaldi se hum kara dete hain taki aapko business bhi aaye buyers aur sahi sahi inquiry ka jo ratio wo bhi badhne lage to koshish kariyega isse aap jald se jald kara de aur kuch bhi help lage to number hai mera aapke paas aap turant reach kar liya kariye directly call ya whatsapp karke hai na?
Customer: Theek hai, okay.
Executive: To haan to ye sari cheeze karwa lijiye baki ek feedback aayega sir kyunki abhi ticket aaya hua hai na to ek feedback aayega is call ke baad thodi der mein to aapko check kar lijiyega notification pe aap satisfied ka option aata hai yes karne ka to wo share kar dijiyega aur bol dijiyega brother ko wo na dekhe bas chale wo samjhe ya kuch aur reply kar de isliye aap ek baar dekh lijiyega khud se na.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko share karta hu thodi der mein.
summary:
Concerns:

- Catalog score is low at 56%.

- Missed calls impacting profile performance.

- Lead consumption is inconsistent.

- Ratings need improvement (currently 4/5).



Resolution:

- Executive provided guidance on improving catalog quality.

- Executive highlighted the importance of call response rate.

- Executive suggested strategies to improve ratings.

- Executive offered his direct number for assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to share the brother's contact number.

- Customer to improve catalog quality and call response.

- Customer to check and share feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, ratings, buyleads, calls, profile
